quest: Winston Churchill lost the General Election in 1945
quest_zh: 溫斯頓·丘吉爾（Winston Churchill）在1945年失去了大選

quest: NSPCC is a charity for which of the following?
quest_zh: NSPCC是以下哪項慈善機構？

quest: Who wrote music for George VI and Queen Elizabeth II?
quest_zh: 誰為喬治六世和伊麗莎白二世皇后寫音樂？

answers.answer_zh: 喬治·弗雷德里克·漢德爾（George Frederick Handel）

quest: Where is the SECC located?
quest_zh: SECC在哪裡？

quest: Where does the Grand National takes place?
quest_zh: 大國民在哪裡？

quest: What is the national flower of Northern Ireland?
quest_zh: 北愛爾蘭的民族花是什麼？

quest: Why is 1969 a very important year in British history?
quest_zh: 為什麼1969年是英國歷史上非常重要的一年？

answers.answer: Women were given the right to vote
Women were given the right to vote at the age of 30
answers.answer_zh: 婦女在30歲時獲得投票權

answers.answer: Women were given the right to vote at the age of 21, same as men
answers.answer_zh: 婦女在21歲時獲得投票權，與男人相同

answers.answer: Women were given the right to vote at the age of 18
answers.answer_zh: 婦女在18歲時獲得投票權

quest: Who wrote about their experiences in the First World War?
quest_zh: 誰寫了他們在第一次世界大戰中的經歷？

answers.answer_zh: 威爾弗雷德·歐文（Wilfred Owen）和西格弗里德·薩森（Siegfried Sassoon）
伊麗莎白和羅伯特·布朗寧
拜倫勳爵和約翰·馬斯菲爾德
威爾弗雷德·歐文（Wilfred Owen）和威廉·布雷克（William Blake）

quest: What can 'Carry on' be associated with?
quest_zh: “繼續”與什麼相關？

quest: In what year did the Troubles break out?
quest_zh: 麻煩爆發了哪一年？

quest: You must treat everyone equally, regardless of sex, race, age, religion, disability, class or sexual orientation
quest_zh: 無論性別，種族，年齡，宗教，殘疾，階級或性取向如何，您都必須平等地對待每個人

quest: The House of Lords is more independent of the government
quest_zh: 上議院更獨立於政府

quest: How many members does a jury have in Scotland?
quest_zh: 陪審團在蘇格蘭有多少成員？

quest: Select TWO famous Athletes
quest_zh: 選擇兩個著名運動員

quest: How can you help looking after the environment?
quest_zh: 您如何幫助照顧環境？

quest: Who wrote the popular operas HMS Pinafore, The Pirates of Penzance and the Mikado?
quest_zh: 誰寫了流行的歌劇HMS Pinafore，Penzance和Mikado的海盜？

quest: In 2003, The Lord of the Rings by JRR Tolkien was voted the country's best loved novel
quest_zh: 2003年，托爾金（Jrr Tolkien）的《指環王》被選為該國最喜歡的小說

quest: Which of the following is correct?
quest_zh: 以下哪項是正確的？

answers.answer: England makes up 83% of the total population
Scotland makes up 8% of the total population
Wales makes up 6% of the total population
Northern Ireland makes up 4% of the total population

quest: Who designed the new St Paul's?
quest_zh: 誰設計了新的聖保羅？

quest: Blood and organ donations are compulsory in the UK
quest_zh: 英國的血液和器官捐贈是強制性的

quest: Protestant Christian groups include Baptists, Methodists, Presbyterians and Quakers
quest_zh: 新教基督教團體包括浸信會，衛理公會，長老會和貴格會

quest: Many of the painters working in Britain in the 16th and 17th centuries were from abroad
quest_zh: 16和17世紀在英國工作的許多畫家來自國外

quest: How many counties in Ireland remained in the UK under Northern Ireland?
quest_zh: 北愛爾蘭領導下的英國有幾個縣？

quest: Who should you contact to get your National Insurance number?
quest_zh: 您應該與誰聯繫以獲取您的國民保險號碼？
